Package abandonallhope.logic

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Collision
    Class containing static methods to check if two objects collide or which is the nearest by other object
    DayChanger
    Class to contain logic for a change of a day.
    Game
    Handles game scenarios
    Items
    Game items contains information about the items in game at any moment.
    ResourceEvents
    Contains resource events used to update resource panel.
    SurvivorSelector
    Handles the logic behind selecting a survivor from the user interface
    Turn
    Contains logic for what happens during a single game turn
